name: Pretendr
description:
Show off to your friends - Be the alpha - or at least pretend to be.

With this app you can impress your friends & family without actually accomplishing anything ! Send custom notifications and customize who "send" them. With a few clicks you can pretend that you are the new CEO of amazon , have a hot girlfriend (or a few) , just got a new sports car and much more ! You will definitely be the coolest one in your friend group.

You wanna be the coolest ? - Get the new app Pretendr.

Activate the app , then show your mates something on your smartphone. Let’s say a funny video. Pretendr now sends you a notification of your choice - For example from a sexy women ;).  Aaaand another one. Your mates will tell everyone what a blatant guy you are. "He is such a blatant dude." - "He always get messages from some hot girls" - "No Way" - "No shit , he is such a womanizer!".

In the app you can easily make profiles and type in your wish message - Like from a potential employer.  Marc Zuckerberg: interested ? I’d love to hire you! or a cool celebrity.  John Cena: outfought me yesterday at the gym! 💪💪. 

Pretendr - And the world is yours.
